channel.title: Posts on going on an adventure!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on going on an adventure!

item.title: pirate's log 1: en-route
item.description: Berk is getting me another coffee. It’s 3am Taipei time (12:04pm SF time) and trying to beat the jet-lag in advance is going poorly. First leg of the journey is complete: 4 and a half hours from CLE to SFO felt slow. Not ecstatic for the next 14 hours to TPE. Berk rates bidets highly and the polaris lounge is for posers and pundits, but not pirates.
